result.execSummary:
The defendant Hank Rowdy Shires was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Hank Rowdy Shires is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Hank Rowdy Shires was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
-  Fine of $250.00 paid in full.
-  Counts 1 and 2 of 22CF271 dismissed.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

3:18 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Hank Rowdy Shires, Defendant Hank Rowdy Shires in court. ADA Damrau recites agreement, amends Ct 3, Information forthcoming. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads NO CONTEST to amended Ct 3 - Possession of THC (Wis Stat 961.41(3g)(e). Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of amended Ct 3 - Possession of THC. On motion of the State without objection, Crt dismisses Cts 1-2. Sentencing recommendations. 

Crt orders: 
- Fine $250
Apply bond on file. 
Adjourned: 3:23 PM. kma

Status conference on May 5, 2022 at 11:30 am.

CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Liddle ADA:   Michelle P Brekken   DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson for purposes of today   DF:  Hank Rowdy Shires appeared from jail. Case called at 1:28 p.m. Court notes this matter was continued from yesterday to check on status of counsel. Atty Stanek is appointed on Pierce County file. Atty Harrelson gives update. DE does qualify for PD services. Requesting bond be modified. Court will not modify bond. Schedules for next week.  Status conference scheduled for May 5, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on April 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.
